name: It’s an early sunday morning,you are baking some cookies,listening to the radio.You hear a shout from the street:” There is a big bad Wolf heading this way”. He is almost here and he is bad to the bone.You known this day was coming he is formidable foe.Time to pigg up what are you  going to do?
He rips your head and and now the blood is all over your place and on your sparkling white new carpet.You are DEAD!
you sneaked out the house,what will you do?

Wolf enters the house huffing and puffing looking for you.”Where are you Piggy-Piggy….?It’s lunch time!!”Wolf ransacking the house,as you fearfully looking from under the couch.He went upstair to check out your bedroom,while eating cookie dough.You got angry,your action:
Your house burned down with the wolf inside.You live happily ever after,as a homeless pig.
You live the long live of a coward.Did it really worth it?
Nobody is coming .Wolf attacks you from the balcony you DEAD!
Too bad you out of ammo.Wolf eats you.
You slay him and keep baking your cookies.
That was a very bad idea you died and wolf ate all your cookies.
Wolf is still upstairs,What will you do?
Wolf hears you and eats you.
He chases you into the street and eats you.
Wolf is sleeping in your bed.You grabbed your sword you chopped the wolf.You live happily ever after.
